title: This former Apple CEO believes OpenAI could be Cupertino’s ‘first real competitor’ in decades
description: Among its megacap tech peers, Apple is the only major company that remains largely on the sidelines when it comes to artificial intelligence.
content:
“In the agentic era, we don’t need a lot of apps – it can all be done with smart agents,” Sculley said at the Zeta Conference in New York. “AI has not been a particular strength for them.”
Sculley may have a point. Among its megacap tech peers, Apple... [2012 chars]

title: Meet the AI chatbots replacing India's call-center workers
description: BENGALURU (Reuters) -At a startup office in this Indian city, developers are fine-tuning artificial-intelligence chatbots that talk and message like humans.
content:
BENGALURU (Reuters) -At a startup office in this Indian city, developers are fine-tuning artificial-intelligence chatbots that talk and message like humans.
The company, LimeChat, has an audacious goal: to make customer-service jobs almost obsolete. ... [11432 chars]

title: 'Erotica' coming to ChatGPT this year, says OpenAI CEO Sam Altman
description: Adult ChatGPT users can soon access a less censored version of the artificial intelligence chatbot, which will include erotic materials, says OpenAI CEO Sam Altman.
content:
Adult ChatGPT users can soon access a less censored version of the artificial intelligence chatbot, which will include erotic materials, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has announced in an apparent policy shift.

title: Is your tech strategy good, or just AI theatre?
description: Artificial intelligence has become the business world’s favourite performance recently. FTSE 100 earnings calls now mention AI more than inflation, and investor briefings increasingly resemble tech expos. Analysts report that AI references in UK company filings have tripled in the past year, yet the results aren’t matching the rhetoric. Markets are beginning to glance sideways. [...]

title: Instagram will limit content for teenagers based on PG-13 ratings
description: The restrictions also apply to conversations between teenage users and artificial intelligence chatbots.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO: A year ago, Instagram made sweeping changes to the account settings of its teenage users after growing scrutiny from parents and lawmakers over child safety issues.
On Oct 14, it took them a step further.

title: MegazoneCloud's AIR Studio Earns Korea's First ISO/IEC 42001 Certification for AI Management Systems
description: SEOUL, South Korea, Oct. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- MegazoneCloud, a leading AI-native digital transformation company, today announced that its enterprise AI platform, Megazone AIR Studio, has achieved ISO/IEC 42001 certification, the world's first international standard for Artificial Intelligence Management Systems (AIMS).

title: GROK222K: The Next AI-Driven Token and How to Maximize Its Potential
description: Rethinking the AI‑Value Paradigm Artificial intelligence today often depends on centralized subscription models, usage credits, or access tokens maintained by a few dominant platforms. title: Go ahead, adopt AI for education, but sharpen the critical capacity of students too
description: As artificial intelligence (AI) storms the world, India’s education system clearly needs to adapt. But the stakes in this field are profoundly high. Given the risk of AI tools going out of alignment with our best interests, AI adoption at the school level must satisfy the strictest of safety tests.
content:
Its rise has already shaken India’s software sector, which needs full R&D mastery over it to make a proper AI pivot, even if adaptation is the urgency right now.
As this year’s Nobel award for economics reminds us, innovation-led growth is not costle... [3039 chars]
